languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, вокс-системы перехватили сигнал бедствия имперского корабля. В системе находится судно, принадлежащее планетарному флоту Даргонуса, столицы династии фон Валанциус. Передача повторяется через равные промежутки времени, а само сообщение искажено — воксы выводят смесь запросов о помощи, стонов и выкриков... что за чертовщина... выкриков вашего имени, Лорд-капитан".

"Lord Captain, the vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperial vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of the von Valancius dynasty. The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, вокс-системы перехватили сигнал бедствия имперского корабля. В системе находится судно, принадлежащее планетарному флоту Даргонуса, столицы династии фон Валанциус. Передача повторяется через равные промежутки времени, а само сообщение искажено — воксы выводят смесь запросов о помощи, стонов и выкриков... что за чертовщина... выкриков вашего имени, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Our vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperium vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of von Valancius dynasty. Apparently, the transmission is repeated at regular intervals. The message itself is corrupted — the voxes produce a cacophony of requests for help, groans and shouts... And it is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

"Lord Captain! Our vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperium vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of von Valancius dynasty. Apparently, the transmission is repeated at regular intervals. The message itself is corrupted — the voxes produce a cacophony of requests for help, groans and shouts... And it is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

"Lord Captain, the vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperial vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of the von Valancius dynasty. The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

languages.text: “舰长大人，音阵系统截获了帝国舰船发出的求救信号。这些信号来自一艘隶属于达戈努斯行星舰队的飞船，负责守护冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的首都。这些求救信号每隔一段时间就会重复一次，但信号本身却遭到了破坏，听起来像是求救、呻吟与呼喊混杂在一起的声音……这到底是怎么回事？那些人都在呼喊着您的名字，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperial vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of the von Valancius dynasty. The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，音阵系统截获了帝国舰船发出的求救信号。这些信号来自一艘隶属于达戈努斯行星舰队的飞船，负责守护冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的首都。这些求救信号每隔一段时间就会重复一次，但信号本身却遭到了破坏，听起来像是求救、呻吟与呼喊混杂在一起的声音……这到底是怎么回事？那些人都在呼喊着您的名字，舰长大人。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los sistemas de voco interceptan una señal de socorro de una nave Imperial. El sistema contiene una nave de la flota planetaria de Dargonus, el mundo capital de la dinastía von Valancius. La transmisión se repite a intervalos regulares, pero el mensaje en sí está dañado. Es una cacofonía de gritos de socorro, gruñidos y súplicas... ¿Cómo puede ser? Lord Capitán, están gritando su nombre».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperial vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of the von Valancius dynasty. The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los sistemas de voco interceptan una señal de socorro de una nave Imperial. El sistema contiene una nave de la flota planetaria de Dargonus, el mundo capital de la dinastía von Valancius. La transmisión se repite a intervalos regulares, pero el mensaje en sí está dañado. Es una cacofonía de gritos de socorro, gruñidos y súplicas... ¿Cómo puede ser? Lord Capitán, están gritando su nombre».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die Voxsysteme haben einen Notruf eines imperialen Schiffes abgefangen. Das Schiff gehört zu Planetarflotte von Dargonus, dem Hauptplaneten der Dynastie derer von Valancius. Die Übertragung wird in regelmäßigen Abständen wiederholt, aber die Nachricht selbst ist fehlerhaft ... eine Kakofonie aus Hilferufen, Stöhnen und Schreien ... Was in aller Welt? Das ist Euer Name, den sie da rufen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperial vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of the von Valancius dynasty. The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die Voxsysteme haben einen Notruf eines imperialen Schiffes abgefangen. Das Schiff gehört zu Planetarflotte von Dargonus, dem Hauptplaneten der Dynastie derer von Valancius. Die Übertragung wird in regelmäßigen Abständen wiederholt, aber die Nachricht selbst ist fehlerhaft ... eine Kakofonie aus Hilferufen, Stöhnen und Schreien ... Was in aller Welt? Das ist Euer Name, den sie da rufen, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les systèmes-vox ont intercepté un signal de détresse émis par un vaisseau impérial. Cette unité appartient à la flotte planétaire de Dargonus, capitale de la dynastie von Valancius. La transmission se répète à intervalle régulier, mais le message lui-même est corrompu. Nous ne parvenons à en tirer qu'une cacophonie d'appels à l'aide, de gémissements et de cris. Et par tous les cogitateurs... c'est votre nom qu'ils hurlent, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperial vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of the von Valancius dynasty. The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les systèmes-vox ont intercepté un signal de détresse émis par un vaisseau impérial. Cette unité appartient à la flotte planétaire de Dargonus, capitale de la dynastie von Valancius. La transmission se répète à intervalle régulier, mais le message lui-même est corrompu. Nous ne parvenons à en tirer qu'une cacophonie d'appels à l'aide, de gémissements et de cris. Et par tous les cogitateurs... c'est votre nom qu'ils hurlent, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ヴォクスシステムが帝国船からの救難信号を傍受しました。星系にはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の首都、ダルゴナスの惑星艦隊に属する船が存在します。信号は一定間隔で何度も送られていますが、メッセージそのものはひどい有様です。助けを求める声、うめき声​​、叫び声がごちゃ混ぜで嫌な音を立てて…ん、これは一体？あなたの名前を叫んでいます、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperial vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of the von Valancius dynasty. The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ヴォクスシステムが帝国船からの救難信号を傍受しました。星系にはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の首都、ダルゴナスの惑星艦隊に属する船が存在します。信号は一定間隔で何度も送られていますが、メッセージそのものはひどい有様です。助けを求める声、うめき声​​、叫び声がごちゃ混ぜで嫌な音を立てて…ん、これは一体？あなたの名前を叫んでいます、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, voks sistemleri bir İmparatorluk gemisinden gelen bir imdat çağrısı aldı. Sistemde von Valancius hanedanlığının başkenti Dargonus'un gezegen filosuna ait bir gemi de bulunuyor. İleti düzenli aralıklarla tekrar ediliyor ama mesajın kendisi bozuk. Yardım taleplerinin, homurtuların ve bağırışların bir karışımı... Bu da ne? Haykırdıkları isim sizinki Lord Kaptan!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the vox-systems intercepted a distress signal coming from an Imperial vessel. The system contains a ship that belongs to the planetary fleet of Dargonus, the capital of the von Valancius dynasty. The transmission is repeated at regular intervals but the message itself is corrupted — a cacophony of requests for help, groans, and shouts... What in the world? It is your name that they are shouting, Lord Captain."
